title: Reporting Suspicious Emails (Phishing)
description: How to identify and report suspicious emails, spam, or phishing attempts.

steps.title: Do Not Click
steps.instruction: Do NOT click any links or download any attachments if you suspect an email is malicious.

steps.title: Check Sender
steps.instruction: Verify the sender's email address carefully. Look for slight misspellings (e.g., @micros0ft.com instead of @microsoft.com).

steps.title: Report Button
steps.instruction: use the 'Report Phishing' button in Outlook (usually in the top ribbon) to automatically alert the security team.

steps.title: Delete Email
steps.instruction: Once reported, permanently delete the email from your Inbox and Deleted Items.

steps.title: Ticket Preparation
steps.instruction: If you accidentally clicked a link or entered credentials, IMMEDIATELLY raise a ticket with 'Urgent: Phishing Clicked' and call the Helpdesk.
